transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SystemInformationID as integer,
		{ Database Version} as string,
		{ VersionDate} as string,
		{ ModifiedDate} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100) ~> source1
source1 derive(SystemInformationID = toString(byName('SystemInformationID')),
		{ Database Version} = toString(byName(' Database Version')),
		{ VersionDate} = toString(byName(' VersionDate')),
		{ ModifiedDate} = toString(byName(' ModifiedDate'))) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted2 sink(input(
		SystemInformationID as integer,
		{Database Version} as string,
		VersionDate as timestamp,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SystemInformationID,
		{Database Version} = { Database Version},
		VersionDate = { VersionDate},
		ModifiedDate = { ModifiedDate}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
